valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Mon 3 Nov 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Tue 4 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: Atlantic low 960 moving steadily northeastwards expected 150 miles west of Bailey 964 by 1800 Monday. Low Faeroes 983 losing its identity

Occasional rain.
